entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
